content: P-U core bit Standard core bit for coring in all types of concrete – for all tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features High drilling performance in all types of concrete Diamond core bit without the Hilti X-Change module system Applications BI quick-release connection end for low power Hilti diamond drilling tools (less than 2.5 kW), Hilti BI shank BL quick-release connection end for high power Hilti diamond drilling tools (more than 2.5 kW), Hilti BL shank BS (1-¼) universal connection end for Hilti and competition diamond drilling tools Rig-based wet coring in all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete Drilling Mode: Rig-mounted Wet or dry operation: Wet Technical Data | For use with | DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Laser welded segments | No | Connection end | BI (Hilti), BS (1-1/4 in), BL (Hilti) | Working length | 17 in | Segment height | 10 mm ### ITEMS- 2196986 -
